title: TNW Answers • Are you addicted to cryptocurrency? Ask the experts
text:
Castle Craig Rehab World renowned addiction treatment clinic. Follow us to get the latest addiction news.

Rupert Wolfe Murray Writer/editor/PR adviser, currently working on cryptocurrency addiction.

Chris Burn I'm a behavioural addictions therapist and author. I write about gambling, gaming and cryptocurrency addiction, as well as poetry and unusual historical facts.

David Charkham I'm an addiction recovery coach. I started out as an actor before getting into recovery. I work for rehab clinics and people in the entertainment industry.

What makes cryptocurrency trading addiction different from other addictions? Why is it so dangerous? What are the warning signs? Can it be treated?



This Wednesday, the team at Castle Craig is hosting a TNW Answers session on addiction to cryptocurrency trading. They are a world-renowned rehabilitation facility in Scotland and are experts in addiction treatment.



Ask them ANYTHING!
